metadata.name: Volcano
metadata.description:
In a peaceful pixel world. There is a dinosaur park. The place is managed by a professor. The professor wants to make his daughter dreams come true to meeting an extinct dinosaur. 
The professor embarks on a journey to find dinosaur DNA to bring back to life. Not the same size, but made with the size of an elephant. He is accompanied by Kuro (dog) and Red (macaw). 
The first journey starts from the volcano. While traveling, the professor encounters a magma monster. Suddenly the professor was helped by someone named AMERTA. 

MOV, 1080X1080, 00:00:57
